Title: Hunting Tactics: Blessing of Ohn'ahra
Description: Your renown with the Maruuk grows. Listen closely, and I will teach you to call upon a blessing of Ohn'ahra to protect you and your allies.
ObjectivesText: Select a blessing of Ohn'ahra for use in the Grand Hunt.
RewardText:
May the winds of Ohn'ahra guide and protect you.

Return when your renown grows, and I will train you further.
